comments: Since the stable release 2002015, the debugger often crashes when you step with F5.I can't reproduce the situation 100% outside my project, but here is the backtrace you get in the log.Let me know if you need more info. If necessary, I will try to reproduce the problem outside my project with a sample.Log: Thu Jan 31 14:55:16 CET 20021 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 Unhandled exception caught in event loop.Log: Thu Jan 31 14:55:16 CET 20024 org.eclipse.ui 0 Widget is disposedorg.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed        at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:1887)        at What VM are you running your debuggable program on?

Eclipse runs with IBM-SDK 1.3.0 SR13: build cx130-20020117a
The debuggable program itself runs under Sun's JDK 1.3.1_02-b02.

The OS is SuSE Linux 7.3 (Kernel 2.4.10)

But I don't think this is a problem specific to a JDK/OS. We experienced similar
stability problems with the latest stable release while debugging on Windows
2000 (IBM-SDK 1.3.0 SR13 for both eclipse and the debugged program)

Please re-open with a test case if required (i.e. if you are still experiencing 
problems). Without a test case, we cannot track this problem down.
